title: Furthermore, any new “Transport Corridor” such as Metro/Mono/Coastal Road /Elevated Corridors/Corridors of Mass Rapid Transit System, including BRTS, proposed by Appropriate Authority and sanctioned by Government, shall stand automatically added on to Development Plan
clause_text: Furthermore, any new “Transport Corridor” such as Metro/Mono/Coastal Road /Elevated Corridors/Corridors of Mass Rapid Transit System, including BRTS, proposed by Appropriate Authority and sanctioned by Government, shall stand automatically added on to Development Plan.
section: Alignment of Metro/Mono/Coastal Road /Elevated Corridors/Corridors of Mass and Rapid Transport System
